job_purpose: The SKA-Low Data Analyst/Telescope Operator plays a fundamental role in delivering broad and ambitious science from the SKA-Low telescope.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Conduct, monitor, and calibrate astronomical observations
Assist with system checks, maintenance handovers, and observation configurations
Undertake quality assurance of radio frequency data
Contribute to the design of operating procedures for SKAO
Support communication between engineering, technical staff, and scientific stakeholders
required_qualifications: Undergraduate degree in science or computing or relevant experience
Aptitude to control and operate a scientific research facility
Appreciation of scientific data acquisition and processing
Ability to contribute to operational procedures and documentation
preferred_qualifications: Experience in data reduction pipelines and time series data
Familiarity with scientific equipment calibration techniques
company_details: At CSIRO, Australia's national science agency, we solve challenges through innovative science and technology. We value diversity and inclusion, offering flexible working arrangements to support our people in achieving work-life balance.
